title: A practical introduction to prediction markets
description:
In this workshop, attendees will participate in "play money" prediction markets on fun events which will happen during the workshop. They will discover how prediction markets work and how they can be used as an information aggregation or decision tools.
- Mechanisms of conditional tokens
- Categorical markets
- Scalar markets
- Multiscalar markets
- Revelation loss problem
- Conditional markets
- Futarchy
